results.title: Statin treatment reduces protein carbonylation in patients with COPD: A randomized controlled study.
results.text_hl: We investigated prothrombotic effects of increased PC content and its modulation by statin use in @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@. MATERIALS AND METHODS: We studied 56 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with stable @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@, who were randomly assigned in an open-label manner to receive @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg/day (n = 28) or to remain without statin for 3 months (n = 28).

citations.NLM: Kruk A, Ząbczyk M, Natorska J, Undas A. Statin treatment reduces protein carbonylation in patients with COPD: A randomized controlled study. Eur J Clin Invest. 2025 Feb 12;():e70009. PMID: 39937085

results.title: Short-Term Impact of the Frequency of COPD Exacerbations on Quality of Life.
results.text_hl: Background: @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ for the Prevention of Exacerbations in Moderate-to-Severe @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@ (STATCOPE) and @CHEMICAL_Azithromycin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017963 @@@Azithromycin@@@ for Prevention of Exacerbations of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@ (MACRO) trials provide an opportunity to prospectively study the short-term effect of @DISEASE_Acute_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000208 @@@acute exacerbations of@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@ (AECOPDs).

results.title: Impact of COPD exacerbations leading to hospitalization on general and disease-specific quality of life.
authors: COPD Clinical Research Network and the Canadian Institutes of Health Research
results.text_hl: METHODS: 1219 @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ enrolled in either the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for the prevention of exacerbations in moderate-to severe @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@ Trial (STATCOPE) or @CHEMICAL_Azithromycin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017963 @@@azithromycin@@@ for prevention of exacerbations of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@ trial (MACRO) were analyzed.

citations.NLM: Camac ER, Voelker H, Criner GJ, COPD Clinical Research Network and the Canadian Institutes of Health Research. Impact of COPD exacerbations leading to hospitalization on general and disease-specific quality of life. Respir Med. 2021 Sep;186():106526. PMID: 34229290

results.title: [Compound Tinglizi Decoction intervenes COPD-associated pulmonary hypertension through regulation of HMGB1-mediated pyroptosis and immune imbalance].
results.text_hl: Ninety rats were randomly divided into a normal group, a model group, low-dose, medium-dose, and high-dose Compound Tinglizi Decoction groups, and a @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group. The rat model of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD-PH@@@ was established by fumigation combined with @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@lipopolysaccharide@@@(@CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@) intravascular infusion, which lasted 60 days.

citations.NLM: Wu XC, Liu Y, Bai ZP. [Compound Tinglizi Decoction intervenes COPD-associated pulmonary hypertension through regulation of HMGB1-mediated pyroptosis and immune imbalance]. Zhongguo Zhong Yao Za Zhi. 2023 Jun;48(11):3055-3065. PMID: 37381964
